title: What colleges were you accepted to, and where are you planning to go? (2020) - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the United States of America

response.answer_text: I was accepted at UCLA, UC Berkeley, UC Santa Barbara, UC San Diego, Baylor, Hawaii Pacific, University of Arizona, Denver University, Ohio State, Cornell, and UChicago. I was waitlisted at Northwestern, Harvard, Princeton, Columbia, and Dartmouth. I’ve decided to opt-in to the waitlists at Columbia, Princeton, and Harvard, but am currently planning on attending UChicago this fall! If you’re interested in my stats and what other schools I applied to here’s a similar post I did: India Hill's answer to What stats got you into a top 20 college?
